titleInfo.title: War and Peace - A Recital in Choral Conducting

mods.note: This audiovisual content is being provided solely for educational use and research, pursuant to exceptions in the Canadian Copyright Act. Further reproduction or distribution or other use may require additional permissions
mods.tableOfContents: Lecture from Dr. Whitney -- Selig Sind, Die Da Leid Tragen: Movement 1: Ein Deutches Requim / Brahms -- Fallen is the Foe (from Judas Maccabeaus) / Handel -- Libera Me / Bardo -- If Ye Love Me / Tallis -- Aglepta / Mellnas -- Ave Maria / McIntyre -- Jerusalem (Soloists: Alison Norris, Kayla MacDonald, Jane Berry, and Brynn MacDonald) / McGlynn -- Dondaine La Ridaine (Soloist: Mark Wilkinson) / Traditional -- Domine Ad Adjuvandum Me Festina (Soloists: Alison Norris, Anna Chen, Jane Berry, James Frobb, Morris Lo, Mike Pearson, Adam Ferland) / Martini -- Sure on the Shining Night / Barber -- Wie Lieblich Sind Deine Wohnunge: Movement 4: Ein Deutches Requim / Brahms
